title: Caught Offside: Ronaldo, Tuchel, England and more
description:
On this week's pod, we discuss the awkward state of the Ronaldo-United relationship and Tomas Tuchel's concerns over the state of his Chelsea team. Plus, England looks to bring it home, Taty leaves for Spain and Roma fans shows up for Dybala.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Caught Offside: What are the expectations for Chelsea this season?
